definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: In the speech the speaker spoke about you.
sentences.chinese: 在这个讲演中，讲演者提到了你。

sentences.english: In the speech the speaker spoke about you.
sentences.chinese: 在这个讲演中，讲演者提到了你。

sentences.english: A large crown soon gathered around the speaker.
sentences.chinese: 讲演者身边很快聚集了一大群人。

sentences.english: The crowd pelted bad eggs at the speaker.
sentences.chinese: 群众向讲演者扔臭鸡蛋。

sentences.english: I haven’t written a speech for tonight so I’ll just have to improvise.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的讲演我没有准备讲稿，所以只有现场发挥了。

sentences.english: We are bored by the speaker's tedious talk.
sentences.chinese: 讲演者那冗长乏味的讲话使我们感到厌烦。

sentences.english: He often pamphleteers and lectures in favour of free trade.
sentences.chinese: 他经常讲演及写小册子支持自由贸易。

sentences.english: The course materials will be taught through a series of lectures and recitations .
sentences.chinese: 本课程教材将借由一系列的上课讲演与复习方式教授。

sentences.english: His speech failed in persuasiveness and proof.
sentences.chinese: 他的讲演缺乏说服力和论据。

sentences.english: The chairman accompanied his speech with gestures.
sentences.chinese: 会议主席作讲演时附带做着手势。

sentences.english: The lecturer was besieged with questions from his audience.
sentences.chinese: 讲演者为听众所提出的许多问题所困恼。

sentences.english: His popularity was so great that he was deluged with honors and invitations to lecture.
sentences.chinese: 盛名之下，荣誉和讲演邀请书纷至沓来。

sentences.english: He was assailed with questions after his lecture .
sentences.chinese: 他讲演完后受到了质问。

sentences.english: The speaker tried hard to impress the audience but left them cold.
sentences.chinese: 讲演者试图感动听众，但他没有打动听众的心。

sentences.english: The speaker mounted the rostrum amid warm applause.
sentences.chinese: 那位讲演者在欢呼声中登上了讲坛。

sentences.english: How would the original speaker have conveyed the words?
sentences.chinese: 试想这位最初的讲演者曾经是怎样传达这些话语的？

definition: to talk with sb (face to face)/discussion/talk/chat
